description: Raymond Education Campus is focused on providing students with a positive learning environment and an array of opportunities to learn. We have a staff of dedicated and highly qualified teachers who inspire children to realize their individual dreams. Our instructional program incorporates RTI, co-teaching, small class sizes, PBIS and technology-driven instruction. In addition, our students receive a comprehensive arts education through Fillmore Arts. These academic and social interactions create exceptional opportunities for children to take pride in who they are and who they can become.
transit: 63, 64 (Federal Triangle - Takoma/Fort Totten), 60, 62 (Fort Totten/Takoma - Georgia Ave/Petworth), 70, 71 (Buzzard Point/9th  &  Maine - Silver Spring), 79 (Archives - Silver Spring), H8 (Mt Pleasant - Rhode Island Ave), 52, 53, 54 (Takoma/14th  &  Buchanan - L'Enfant Plaza/McPherson Sq)
